timeline.message: better alert check logic and test cleanup

timeline.bodyText:
This is a change: previously we would run this cost check for users with null registration times.
However it is not very meaningful because any user who actually logs into the system will not have a null registration time.
I decided to make this change because it makes the logic a little simpler.
timeline.author: jmthibault79
jmthibault79

timeline.bodyText: There was a lot of duplication in the buildXMessage and buildXHtml methods, so I made this process more generic.  I'll need to add 3 more of these for RW-3661.
